item.title: Aruna assures Aiza becoming Assembly constituency
item.description:
<![CDATA[Mahabubnagar: A significant political push is building up in Aiza, as leaders from various political parties jointly submitted a memorandum to DK Aruna, Member of Parliament, Mahabubnagar, demanding the formation of Aiza as a new Assembly Constituency and Gadwal as a separate Parliamentary Constituency under Palamuru region.
Responding to their appeal of all party members from Gadwal, Aruna gave assurance that the chances of Aiza becoming an Assembly Constituency are high, and she would work de...]]>
item.author: The Hans India
